author: Candace Taylor
title: Making Your Vacation Home Your Full-Time Home
text:
One night in her home outside Charlotte, N.C., Francesca High woke up in a panic. “We’ve got to move,” she said to herself.
Ms. High, a 41-year-old health-care consultant, and her husband both had long, traffic-filled daily commutes. With three young children, “we really just didn’t have the family life that we fantasized about,” she says.
Fast-forward...
